verbs.description: besit (third-person singular simple present besits, present participle besitting, simple past besat, past participle besat or (archaic) besitten)

entries.meaning: (transitive, obsolete) To sit around; sit about; besiege.
(transitive, obsolete) To sit properly upon, as clothes; to suit; become.
